Name: Golf Peaks
About the game: Golf Peaks is a tiny puzzle game where you climb mountains by playing golf. Use cards to move the ball, solve over 120 handcrafted levels and conquer the summits! * 1st place in The Big Indie Pitch @ PGA 2018 * FEATURES: 120+ levels and 10 worlds to complete Various block types to experiment with Unique card-based movement system Minimalist visuals and a relaxing atmosphere Achievements Zero understanding of golf required! 1% of revenue from all copies of this game will be donated to the Animal Rescue Polska foundation For more info please visit and .
